title: IAA Tonight | Deshaun Watson Receives Six Game Suspension for Sexual Misconduct
description: Sue L. Robinson, a former U.S. District Court judge, who was appointed the league’s disciplinary officer this year in an agreement between the NFL and the NFL Players Association has handed down Cleveland Browns QB Deshaun Watson a six game suspension. We check in with Audacy's Legal Analyst Amy Dash to discuss the punishment. Plus, NBA Legend Bill Russell passed away over the weekend. We remember the life and legacy of one of the all time greats.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Antoine Walker, Chantel Tremetiere)
